/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a hazy orange, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
